Pattern Library

breadcrumbs component

< back to style guide

Use in your project:

npm i @bit/kimlarocca.vue.breadcrumbs

Props:
  • :crumbs - an array of objects containing the breadcrumb name and link
  •    [{name, link}] - link is optional
  •    the separator is defined in the _breadcrumbs.scss file
Example:
